overview: Inside Story. Hollywood 1957. A town of glamour, glitz and stars. But beneath the tinsel, dark secrets lurk. Secrets of the night. Secrets of hidden delights. And exposing those dark doings are the intrepid reporters of... Inside Story. Their most daring reporter is supernatural babe Lindsey Dawn McKenzie. Join her on her journey into the dark sexual side of old-world Hollywood. Exclusive, inside a secret sex society. Hot ladies! Hollywood! Girls from Muncie cut to look like stars! Linsey Dawn McKenzie uncovers an underground sex ring where ladies, cut to look like film stars, fulfill your every sexual desire.
title: Inside Story
